```{r setup}
library(aquaras)
```
Package made for personal use. Facilitates creation of a runlist for use with Waters MassLynx software for working with the LC/MS.

Default data frame used to build the runlist.
```{r}
str(Runlist_default)
head(Runlist_default)
```
